column4: hi ppl, when booting my up-to-date ubuntu system, i always get a "fail" when it comes to "starting firestarter". i would like my firewall to work, what could be wrong, and where could i get more information what 'fail' actually means?
firestarter is a frontend, if u uninstall it i think your firewall is still goind.
how could I check that it is actaully running then? i think it uses iptables, right?
i don't know. I just hope for the best these days!
